00030 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_SEC
00031 #include <linux/init.h>
00032 #include <linux/module.h>
00033 #include <linux/slab.h>
00034 #include <linux/crypto.h>
00035 #include <linux/mutex.h>
00036 
00037 #include <obd.h>
00038 #include <obd_class.h>
00039 #include <obd_support.h>
00040 
00041 #include "gss_err.h"

00044 #include "gss_asn1.h"
00045 
00046 struct sk_ctx {
00047 };
00048 
00049 static
00050 __u32 gss_import_sec_context_sk(rawobj_t *inbuf, struct gss_ctx *gss_context)
00051 {
00052         struct sk_ctx *sk_context;
00053 
00054         if (inbuf == NULL || inbuf->data == NULL)
00055                 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
00056 
00057         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(sk_context);
00058         if (sk_context == NULL)
00059                 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
00060 
00061         gss_context->internal_ctx_id = sk_context;
00062         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "successfully imported sk context\n");
00063 
00064         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00065 }
00066 
00067 static
00068 __u32 gss_copy_reverse_context_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context_old,
00069                                     struct gss_ctx *gss_context_new)
00070 {
00071         struct sk_ctx *sk_context_old;
00072         struct sk_ctx *sk_context_new;
00073 
00074         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(sk_context_new);
00075         if (sk_context_new == NULL)
00076                 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
00077 
00078         sk_context_old = gss_context_old->internal_ctx_id;
00079         memcpy(sk_context_new, sk_context_old, sizeof(*sk_context_new));
00080         gss_context_new->internal_ctx_id = sk_context_new;
00081         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "successfully copied reverse sk context\n");
00082 
00083         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00084 }
00085 
00086 static
00087 __u32 gss_inquire_context_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context,
00088                                unsigned long *endtime)
00089 {
00090         *endtime = 0;
00091         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00092 }
00093 
00094 static
00095 __u32 gss_get_mic_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context,
00096                      int message_count,
00097                      rawobj_t *messages,
00098                      int iov_count,
00099                      lnet_kiov_t *iovs,
00100                      rawobj_t *token)
00101 {
00102         token->data = NULL;
00103         token->len = 0;
00104 
00105         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static
00109 __u32 gss_verify_mic_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context,
00110                         int message_count,
00111                         rawobj_t *messages,
00112                         int iov_count,
00113                         lnet_kiov_t *iovs,
00114                         rawobj_t *token)
00115 {
00116         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00117 }

00119 static
00120 __u32 gss_wrap_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context, rawobj_t *gss_header,
00121                     rawobj_t *message, int message_buffer_length,
00122                     rawobj_t *token)
00123 {
00124         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00125 }
00126

00128 __u32 gss_unwrap_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context, rawobj_t *gss_header,
00129                       rawobj_t *token, rawobj_t *message)
00130 {
00131         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00132 }

00135 __u32 gss_prep_bulk_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context,
00136                          struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00137 {
00138         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
00139 }

00143                          struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc, rawobj_t *token,

00145 {
00146         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;

00153 {
00154         return GSS_S_COMPLETE;

00157 static
00158 void gss_delete_sec_context_sk(void *internal_context)
00159 {
00160         struct sk_ctx *sk_context = internal_context;
00161 
00162         OBD_FREE_PTR(sk_context);
00163 }
00164 
00165 int gss_display_sk(struct gss_ctx *gss_context, char *buf, int bufsize)
00166 {
00167         return snprintf(buf, bufsize, "sk");
00168 }
00169 
00170 static struct gss_api_ops gss_sk_ops = {
00171         .gss_import_sec_context     = gss_import_sec_context_sk,
00172         .gss_copy_reverse_context   = gss_copy_reverse_context_sk,
00173         .gss_inquire_context        = gss_inquire_context_sk,
00174         .gss_get_mic                = gss_get_mic_sk,
00175         .gss_verify_mic             = gss_verify_mic_sk,
00176         .gss_wrap                   = gss_wrap_sk,
00177         .gss_unwrap                 = gss_unwrap_sk,
00178         .gss_prep_bulk              = gss_prep_bulk_sk,
00179         .gss_wrap_bulk              = gss_wrap_bulk_sk,
00180         .gss_unwrap_bulk            = gss_unwrap_bulk_sk,
00181         .gss_delete_sec_context     = gss_delete_sec_context_sk,
00182         .gss_display                = gss_display_sk,
00183 };
00184 
00185 static struct subflavor_desc gss_sk_sfs[] = {
00186         {
00187                 .sf_subflavor   = SPTLRPC_SUBFLVR_SKI,
00188                 .sf_qop         = 0,
00189                 .sf_service     = SPTLRPC_SVC_INTG,
00190                 .sf_name        = "ski"
00191         },
00192         {
00193                 .sf_subflavor   = SPTLRPC_SUBFLVR_SKPI,
00194                 .sf_qop         = 0,
00195                 .sf_service     = SPTLRPC_SVC_PRIV,
00196                 .sf_name        = "skpi"
00197         },
00198 };
00199 
00200 /*
00201  * currently we leave module owner NULL
00202  */
00203 static struct gss_api_mech gss_sk_mech = {
00204         .gm_owner       = NULL, /*THIS_MODULE, */
00205         .gm_name        = "sk",
00206         .gm_oid         = (rawobj_t) {
00207                 12,
00208                 "\053\006\001\004\001\311\146\215\126\001\000\001",
00209         },
00210         .gm_ops         = &gss_sk_ops,
00211         .gm_sf_num      = 2,
00212         .gm_sfs         = gss_sk_sfs,
00213 };
00214 
00215 int __init init_sk_module(void)
00216 {
00217         int status;
00218 
00219         status = lgss_mech_register(&gss_sk_mech);
00220         if (status)
00221                 CERROR("Failed to register sk gss mechanism!\n");
00222 
00223         return status;
00224 }
00225 
00226 void cleanup_sk_module(void)
00227 {
00228         lgss_mech_unregister(&gss_sk_mech);
00229 }
